name: sw-proxy
description: A RFC-compliant HTTP proxy library for service workers.
author: Michael Stillwell <mjs@beebo.org> (https://beebo.org/)

scripts.prepublish: tsc -p tsconfig.json --module commonjs --outDir dist/commonjs && tsc -p tsconfig.json --module es6 --outDir dist/es6
scripts.examples: cd examples ; for f in *.ts ; do rollup -c -i $f -o `basename $f .ts`.js ; done
